name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: Results-driven Program Manager with 8+ years of experience in software engineering, specializing in **Project Management**, **Change Management**, and **Data Analysis**. Skilled in leading cross-functional teams to deliver high-performance solutions within e-commerce, financial, and healthcare sectors. Proficient in utilizing **GCP** for cloud-based applications, while maintaining robust documentation and effective communication across stakeholders. Expert in **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask, SQLAlchemy) and experienced in frontend frameworks such as **Angular**, **Vue**, **React**, and **Next.js**. Adept at implementing **microservices architecture** and developing **REST/gRPC APIs**. Strong focus on collaboration and time management to ensure project milestones are met, driving successful outcomes aligned with organizational goals.

Facilitated the integration of observability using **Prometheus, Grafana**, and the **ELK stack** for ongoing health checks and proactive issue resolution in systems.
Orchestrated the development of ETL pipelines in Python incorporating **Apache Airflow** and **Kafka** for efficient data handling and transformation, supporting strategic operational insights and reporting.
